body.class: mediawiki ltr ns-6 ns-subject page-File_Flag_of_Romania_svg skin-vector

img.alt: File:Flag of Romania.svg

div.p: Flag_of_Romania.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 600 × 400 pixels, file size: 262 B)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

img.alt: Flag of Romania (construction).png

td.p: Construction sheet of the Flag of Romania as depicted in Law nr. 75 from 26 August 1994.

Pantone colors and RGB values from Vexilla Mundi, which cites “Album des pavillons nationaux et des marques distinctives” / “National flags and distinctive markings” by Armand du Payrat and Daniel Roudaut (illustrations), 2000:

table.style: background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px solid #aaaaaa; border-collapse: collapse; white-space: nowrap; text-align: left; align:center

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

tr.td: Implicit public domain, as per Romanian copyright law.

td.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; font-weight: bold

img.alt: Flag of Romania (as seen).svg

div.p: Please see Image talk:Flag of Romania.svg for any debate regarding correct colors.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

img.alt: Public domain
Coat of arms of Romania.svg

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 09:12, 10 March 2009
Thumbnail for version as of 18:15, 5 September 2008
Thumbnail for version as of 12:19, 11 December 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 18:02, 7 December 2007

td.span: (Colors calculated as an average from several photographs, details soon on the talk page.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 02:21, 6 December 2007

td.span: (If the blue is the only issue with the flag, then why were the other colors changed. Anyways, using the blue from the current image and going with a previous red and yellow.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 16:11, 3 December 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 17:11, 27 November 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 05:28, 24 October 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 05:24, 24 October 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 05:18, 24 October 2006

td.span: (== Summary == {{Information |Description=The national flag of Romania. Colors taken from FOTW (CMYK color codes converted to RGB). The colors stand for the three historical provinces of Romania, as a symbol of unity: Transylvania, Wallachia and Moldova. |)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 05:17, 24 October 2006

td.span: ({{Information |Description=The national flag of Romania. Colors taken from FOTW (CMYK color codes converted to RGB). The colors stand for the three historical provinces of Romania, as a symbol of unity: Transylvania, Wallachia and Moldova. |Source=http://)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 20:52, 24 September 2006

td.span: ({{Information |Description=Flag of Romania using proper colors |Source=http://aranea.zuavra.net/index.php/38/ |Date=Aug 20, 2006 |Author=Skippy |Permission=Representations of the Romanian flag cannot make the object of copyright, as per Romanian law 8/199)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:38, 20 August 2006

td.span: (code to avoid light stripes after scaling)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:54, 5 January 2006

td.span: (Don't ask me why - apparently not all characters are allowed in the comment line... )

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 17:12, 5 January 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 07:58, 20 December 2005
Thumbnail for version as of 15:46, 24 November 2005

td.span: (The national flag of Romania. The colors were taken from FOTW, but I drew the image myself. (stated by User:Zscout370))
